manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: vH essentials Probiotics with Prebiotics and Cranberry Feminine Health Supplement - 60 Capsules Probiotics and Cranberry for women offers a natural way to boost both feminine tract and urinary tract healthOffered in 60 count and 120 count optionsContain probiotics, fructo-oligosaccharides (prebiotics), and natural cranberry powderProbiotics and prebiotics in cranberry capsules for broad microbial support, a natural way to bolster vaginal healthWhen taken as directed, may help reduce risk of recurrent urinary tract infections (UTI)Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease vH essentials, Ph Balanced Daily Feminine Wash with Tea Tree & Prebiotic One 6 fl oz tube of vH essentials Tea Tree Oil & Prebiotic Daily Feminine WashThis vaginal wash offers vH Microbalance Odor Blocking Blend in a tea tree oil cleanserIntimate wash and feminine cleanser contains tea tree oil, prebiotics (fructo-oligosaccharides), lavender seed oil and cranberry to help soothe and support feminine careParaben free pH balanced feminine wash contains no artificial colors, artificial dyes or animal byproductsUse this womens feminine wash as a gentle daily cleanser to help fight vaginal odor or as an all-over gentle body washNow available in hypoallergenic! vH essentials Boric Acid + Tea Tree Vaginal Suppositories - 24 Count Our boric acid suppositories are infused with natural tea tree oil and lactic acid, to gently support intimate health by balancing vaginal pH levels and helping control odor.Easy and comfortable to insert with our reusable vaginal suppository applicator. It’s natural feminine care that really works.Relieve feminine issues with pure boric acid infused with tea tree oil, lactic acid and prebiotics. No fragrances, parabens or animal byproducts used ever!Restore your wellbeing and confidence. Bye-bye odor! Hello, a refreshed you! Insert daily at bedtime to feel clean and comfortable again. vH essentials Vaginal Odor Treatment, pH Balanced Vaginal Tablet - 6 Tablets One box of 6 vH essentials pH Balanced Vaginal Odor Suppositories With Vaginal ApplicatorFeminine odor care vaginal suppositories supercharged with ascorbic acidSupport vaginal health with a healthy pH balance, eliminate embarrassing feminine odor and reduce unpredictable feminine hygiene irregularities with vH essentials Odor Treatment tabletsFast-acting, no-mess, time-release feminine products help support a normal, healthy pH balance for women

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was worried about the peppermint oil in this being too strong and/or causing irritation but it hasn't been a problem at all. It's refreshing, leaves a nice clean feeling and no overpowering scent. I will definitely purchase this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Does the Job!!
reviews.reviewText: I has pleasant smell and works as said. I only used it once but I used to buy another product, but after readying the reviews I decided to order this cleansing spray. I will be re-ordering soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beware your first time!!
reviews.reviewText: Okay so the first use was definitely something to get used to. It does smell funny but once sprayed on your area it doesn't stay. After getting use to the feeling, I loved it. Kept me fresh, I even used on my underarms while on vacay to freshen up. 10/10 recommend. A smaller size for travel would be nice though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t seem to do anything…..but I will try a little more.The smell of the product, mixing with any other product used earlier seems to havehave a strange odor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hot shot for your crotch
reviews.reviewText: This has peppermint in it which caused me to have a burning tingle, then a slight numbness. If you're sensitive, tread with caution. Great concept though, spray works upside down. If they had a version without peppermint oil, I would buy it again but I may look into buying aerosol water for a rinse on the go. Better yet, I may mix up some alcohol free witch hazel and water and put it into a mister spray bottle...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing! I purchased this product after seeing many many videos of good reviews on tiktok & I honestly regret not buying it sooner. This is the first real ingredients product I have come across that I can say ACTUALLY WORKS! I apply externally after a shower & it keeps my hooha smelling great all day. I love that it has witch hazel, which is a great cleanser for the sensitive areas and it helps restore and maintain PH balance which is awesome. The scent is very light I actually like it because I am extra sensitive and can not use anything that smells too strong down there or else it completely throws my PH off. So far I have been using it for 3 weeks and no complaints, no having to reapply throughout the day unless of course after showering, which is great. I am glad I purchased this and cant wait to purchase more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amo este producto
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto, de verdad es muy bueno me cambió la vida sin duda volvería a comprar este producto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s smells like cranberries ah bit..you can use it when getting out the shower it’ll leave your kitty smelling fresh all day long it blocks Odors, I’m very sensitive down there so I was quite worried about using it in that area but overall I didn’t have any problems with it it’s a great product 10/10 I will buy again.
